text: Professor 'Abdulfattah bin Suleiman Al Mashat is the Rector of the newly established Jeddah University, Saudi Arabia since June 23, 2016. He was previously at King Abdulaziz University, holding the positions of Dean of Admission and Registration, director of the Center for Information Technology from 2004–2006, Dean of the Faculty of Computing and Information Technology from 2012 to 2016, both at King Abdulaziz University. ad then Vice Rector for Development (2013- 2016). ==Early life== Al Mashat was born in Mecca in 1386 AH and descended from the well respected family of Bany Mashat Almonayfiyyen, which produced a number of Islamic clergymen like Shaikh Abdul Qadir Bin Ali Mashat Al-Munafy. ==References== == External links == * Ubio at University of Jeddah * Google Scholar * dblp * ResearchGate Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Mecca
title: Abdulfattah S. Mashat
